alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 6:22PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin, Central Colorado River Basin and Debeque to Silt Corridor. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Expect slick and snowy roads including the I-70 corridor. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
